items.desc: Acknowledge the pain you've buried.

items.desc: You realize you have quick reflexes, you can act without thinking

items.name: Calm thinker
items.desc: You realize you are a calm thinker, someone who thinks deeply before acting

items.name: Rat's Insight
items.desc: By observing rats, you gain a sharper, more cunning perspective on your thoughts.

items.desc: The presence of rats amplifies the depth of your sadness, bringing it into sharper focus.

items.name: Ponder Crumbs
items.desc: I have so many...

items.desc: You approach foraging with a calm and reflective mindset. Each step is taken with care and intention.

items.desc: Your foraging is driven by your body energy. Every movement is infused with vitality.

items.name: Sad Search
items.desc: Your foraging is marked by a deep, quiet melancholy. The emotions guide your path through the earth.

items.desc: Celebrate the death of evil

items.desc: Coordinate stealing feats with your rats

items.desc: The holes where they throw all the garbage in

items.desc: Narrow stone tunnels carry waste downhill, draining into the river outside the city.

items.desc: You can't help but feel the blues

items.desc: Grates of iron, filled with rust. I wonder what is beyond...

items.desc: Deep in hunger, close to insanity
